extendedInfo.description: Howdy partner! Get your trigger finger ready for a real swell game set in the Wild West! Cowboys and Zombies combines RPG, real-time strategy and beat-em-up game mechanics to create a unique experience.  Play Cowboys and Zombies for free!Horror in the Town of PalmtonWelcome to the quiet town of Palmton, a collection of hovels and misery out on the Great Plains, where drifters come to find a little hope, a lot of trouble and, occasionally, a one-way trip to the big ranch up in the sky. See the dingy saloon, the gunsmith shop, the corralâ¦ in this dismal setting we encounter Jackal the bounty hunter, a gun for hire like so many others who have walked the muddy roads of Palmton. But today itâs a different story entirely.Romero, the old gravedigger, recounts what he saw: âLong-time goners from the bone orchard clawed their way outta the dirt! They gone up an' started gnawing each other like they were hungry 'nough to eat a saddle!â The undead had arisen.Not Your Average Shoot-OutSpilling out into the town, the horrible fiends claim their victims. Panic, fear and terror spread through Palmton. Rotting animals and birds soon join the horde of human corpses. The dead of all species walk in Palmton, thirsting for blood.Meanwhile, Jackal the bounty hunter is idling the night away in the saloon in the company of Jane the bartender. When the screams begin, the two of them high-tail it out of the saloon, guns at the ready.Fight like Kilkenny CatsPalmton will soon be overrun by the undead, but Jackal can help! Lead the ace bounty hunter and his rag-tag team of huckleberries as they fight to prevent the ghastly ghouls from taking over Palmton. It won't be an easy task, but you can recruit assorted vagrants, wanderers, adventurers and lonesome cowboys to join your team!Take the reins and control Jackal, Jane and the others as they mow down every zombie in sight! Depending on your team members you can shoot, stab, slash, pierce, smash, crush, cut, skewer or blow up the undead nasties. Simply visit the saloon and hire some able hands. Earn experience and learn new skills at the trainer. Pick up better weapons and the best outfits in town at the local smith. Are you gunslinger enough to get Palmton out of this darned mess?Features- Awesome Wild West setting- High-quality comic-book inspired art- Addicting gameplay that combines RPG, RTS and arcade classic Beat-em-up- 4 team members; choose from multiple classes- Hire additional characters at the Good Ol' Saloon- Learn new skills by spending experience at the trainer- Replace or upgrade your gear by visiting the local smithy- Take advantage of the daily Chest Draw, where you can get random freebies.- Skedaddle, stab, and shoot the undead through 38 different levels- 39 achievements to unlock**Please note that while the app is free, it contains paid content for real money that can be purchasedupon users' wish to enhance their gaming experience. You can disable in-app purchases by adjustingyour deviceâs settings. **

reviews.title: Fun game but...
reviews.comment: pretty addictive game would give 5 stars if they would give more money instead of just coins and leveling up was faster also needs better attack power ups if this changes I would definatly give it 5 stars
reviews.author: Julian Western

reviews.title: Needs to resolve these issues
reviews.comment: I really like this game at first but gradually becoming very difficult and my gunslinger is at max level but cant upgrade him because he is at max level?why is that?you need to make an icon in upgrades section i.e reset points because sniper damage..attack speed i didnt use it at all..and your offers at tapjoy are also sick i do what they offer and after that no z points..please update this good game to at its best
reviews.author: Ali Afnan

reviews.title: Great game but...
reviews.comment: So hard to earn gold coins to get new weapons & move on to the next level
reviews.author: Jason Chuang

reviews.title: The best game ever
reviews.comment: Sick

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: Every day willhave one  gun
reviews.author: Alfie Aloysius Tay

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Another great potential game ru\"H\"ined by the fact you must either grind for days upon end or just submit your credit card to paying for credit in order to get anywhere (sigh). Uninstalled
reviews.author: Aaron Mcentee

reviews.title: Working great on galaxy sl
reviews.comment: As awesome as battle heart, gold earning are a little harder than battle heart but that makes the game last longer lol nice game to grind for exp just like the rpg i wanted and this time story line is added too! Keep looking forward what will happen next  :)
reviews.author: SamueLiew nyetsian

reviews.title: Meh...
reviews.comment: It\'s fine, I suppose.  Game balance is set so that you need to spend money or grind levels 20-30 times in order to progress.  If I wasn\'t bored on the train day after day, I\'d definitely not have time for a grindfest such as this one.
reviews.author: Ken Remaly

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: Good game the  idea is cool . Grindfest as mentioned.  Would be better as a more ff style turn based game, there is too much going on to micro manage and trying to select targets amongst a huddle of layers not so fun. Get used to it tho. Other then that the skill sets are cool and I like the idea of the bartender as a healer
reviews.author: Daren Shippit

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Really forces you to buy currency though...  or suffer playing the same levels over and over again..  I suffered..
reviews.author: Adam McLean

reviews.title: I won with out my credit card
reviews.comment: I love this game. Its really entertaining. Great ending , i hope there\'s going to be a number 2

reviews.comment: Great but need to increase gold earnings. Will never be able to afford anything unless u spend $$$ sort it out
